statements: SELECT id, item_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50;

SELECT id, item_name FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 150.00 ORDER BY price;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%' OR item_name LIKE '%B' ORDER BY item_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC;

SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 OR price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory AS I JOIN SalesData AS S ON I.item_id = S.item_id WHERE S.quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY sale_date ASC, quantity DESC;
